creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: Back at it: our “leadership” peddling snake oil for their own benefit. Pretend the problem is solved, force people back to work, profit. Meanwhile US Coronavirus deaths have surpassed the combat deaths of US servicemen in the Korean War, Vietnam War, Afghanistan, and Iraq.
title: May 18, 2020: IT WILL GO AWAY!
